summary: Backend Developer with 1.5+ years of professional experience at Red Fibre building RESTful APIs with Java Spring Boot. MSc Cybersecurity (NCI Dublin, 2:1) with CEH Master certification. Prior cybersecurity internship at SecurePoint Solutions. Open source contributor to TheAlgorithms/Java (59K+ stars). Completed 8-week DevOps intensive program with hands-on CI/CD, Docker, and AWS projects. 24 GitHub repositories demonstrating coding ability. Authorized to work in Ireland (Stamp 1G visa - eligible for Critical Skills Employment Permit).
visa_status: Stamp 1G (Work Authorized, eligible for Critical Skills Employment Permit)

experience.title: Back End Developer
highlights: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Java Spring Boot, serving 10,000+ daily requests with 99.9% uptime
Implemented unit tests with JUnit and Mockito, achieving 85% code coverage and reducing production bugs by 40%
Optimized database queries in MySQL, improving API response times by 35% through indexing and query refactoring
Collaborated with frontend team to design and document API contracts using Swagger/OpenAPI specifications
Participated in Agile ceremonies including daily standups, sprint planning, and retrospectives
Conducted code reviews focusing on SOLID principles, clean code practices, and security best practices
Containerized microservices using Docker, reducing deployment time by 60%
Integrated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment
experience.note: First professional tech role after BTech graduation

experience.title: Cybersecurity Intern
highlights: Conducted vulnerability assessments on web applications using OWASP methodology and Burp Suite
Performed penetration testing on network infrastructure identifying 15+ security vulnerabilities
Documented security findings and remediation recommendations in detailed technical reports
Assisted senior analysts in security audits and compliance assessments
Gained hands-on experience with Kali Linux, Nmap, Metasploit, and Wireshark
Participated in security awareness training sessions for client employees
experience.note: Cybersecurity internship during final year of BTech, before Red Fibre job

interview_talking_points.open_source: I recently contributed to TheAlgorithms/Java, one of GitHub's most popular algorithm repositories with over 59,000 stars. I enhanced the BinarySearch algorithm documentation by adding comprehensive JavaDoc, complexity analysis, and practical examples. The contribution went through code review, addressed formatting feedback, and passed all CI/CD checks.
interview_talking_points.devops_program: I completed an 8-week DevOps intensive program where I built three hands-on projects: a Flask CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions and Docker, Terraform infrastructure for AWS, and Kubernetes deployment configurations.
interview_talking_points.ssl_project: I built an SSL/TLS assessment tool using Spring Boot that connects to HTTPS servers, performs TLS handshakes, validates certificates, and displays security information like protocol version and cipher suite.
interview_talking_points.learning_approach: I follow a structured learning approach, currently transitioning from T-shaped to M-shaped skill development with three pillars: Backend Development, DevOps, and Cybersecurity.

note_to_ai: IMPORTANT: This candidate has 1.5+ YEARS PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE with key differentiators: 1) Backend Developer at Red Fibre (1.5 years) with Spring Boot, Docker, CI/CD, 2) Cybersecurity Intern at SecurePoint Solutions, 3) Open source contribution to 59K+ star repo, 4) CEH Master certification, 5) MSc Cybersecurity, 6) 8-week DevOps program. Position as JUNIOR/MID-LEVEL candidate, NOT fresh graduate. CV should be 2 PAGES to showcase all experience and projects.
